statements: SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, course_id FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE course_id = 101 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE student_id IN (101, 105, 110) ORDER BY enrollment_date ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'J%' AND enrollment_date < '2019-06-01';
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE grade_level > 10
SELECT student_name, GPA FROM Students WHERE GPA >= 3.5
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE student_id = 101
SELECT * FROM Grades WHERE subject = 'Math' ORDER BY grade DESC
SELECT student_name, subject, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id
SELECT student_name, grade_level, GPA FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT subject, grade FROM Grades WHERE student_id = 1 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT student_name, GPA FROM Students WHERE grade_level >= 10 ORDER BY GPA DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade_level, GPA, subject, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id;
SELECT student_name, grade_level, GPA FROM Students WHERE GPA BETWEEN 3.5 AND 4.0 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE enrollment_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, credit_hours FROM courses WHERE credit_hours > 3;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students JOIN student_grades ON students.student_id = student_grades.student_id WHERE grade >= 90;
SELECT * FROM student_grades ORDER BY grade DESC, student_id ASC;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, credit_hours FROM courses WHERE credit_hours > 3;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students JOIN student_grades ON students.student_id = student_grades.student_id WHERE students.enrollment_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT course_name, AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM courses JOIN student_grades ON courses.course_id = student_grades.course_id GROUP BY course_name;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students JOIN student_grades ON students.student_id = student_grades.student_id WHERE grade >= 80;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM students;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT student_id, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM enrollments JOIN grades ON enrollments.enrollment_id = grades.enrollment_id GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, date_of_birth FROM students WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';

SELECT student_id, student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE course_name LIKE '%Math%';

SELECT student_id, student_name, AVG(score) AS avg_score FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN grades ON enrollments.enrollment_id = grades.enrollment_id GROUP BY student_id HAVING avg_score > 80;

SELECT student_name, instructor, grade_id FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id JOIN grades ON enrollments.enrollment_id = grades.enrollment_id WHERE instructor IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE year_of_birth > 2000;
SELECT course_name, credits, semester FROM courses WHERE credits >= 3;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date, grade FROM enrollments WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT assignment_date, max_score, description FROM assignments ORDER BY assignment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE year_of_birth > 2000 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE first_name LIKE 'A%' OR first_name LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email, year_of_birth FROM students WHERE year_of_birth BETWEEN 1990 AND 2000;
SELECT course_name, credits, semester FROM courses WHERE credits >= 3 AND semester = 'Fall' ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT assignment_id, course_id, assignment_date, max_score FROM assignments WHERE max_score > 50 ORDER BY assignment_date DESC;
